Traveler Stories

"Our family trip to the Mara was magical. The guides were superb and our kids are still talking about it." — Sara, UK
"Gorilla trekking was life-changing. The care taken by the team meant we felt safe and respectful." — Daniel, Kenya

FAQ

What is included in most packages?

Accommodation, park fees (if specified), most meals, guiding & transfers. Flights and travel insurance are usually not included unless noted.

Do you arrange travel visas?

We can advise and assist with visa letters but do not issue visas ourselves. Some permits (eg gorilla permits) are handled directly through our bookings team.

); } export default App;
